level.heading: Reports.
level.text: Semiannually, the Commission shall submit to the Mayor, the Chairman of the Council, and the Chairman of the District of Columbia Board of Election and Ethics, a detailed written report of its activities, revenues, and expenditures (including the full name, home address, occupation, employer, and amount of each contributor of each financial contribution, and the source, value, and form of each other gift, grant, bequest, or appropriation to the Fund), other information required by this subpart, and any other information deemed appropriate by the Commission. The Commission shall make each report available to the general public upon request.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For Law 15-226, see notes following ยง 1-129.01.
